snippet: Future historians may well describe President Obama's declaration on gay marriage as righteous or inspiring or a watershed moment. What they probably won't call it is a case of bold political leadership.
abstract: Future historians may well describe President Obama's declaration on gay marriage as righteous or inspiring or a watershed moment. What they probably won't call it is a case of bold political leadership.

headline.main: Obama's Stance Is Significant, if Not Bold Leadership

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
